sentences.en: A raccoon is many times as big as a crab.
sentences.cn: 浣熊要比螃蟹大上好几倍.

sentences.en: After my ski trip, my face look like a raccoon.
sentences.cn: 滑雪之旅后, 我的脸变得像浣熊一样了.

sentences.en: BIG raccoon didn't take note of it andhistouching as playing.
sentences.cn: 大浣熊并未注意到她的变化,还是一如既往的嬉戏欢闹.

sentences.en: He plunged his hands into the raccoon coat and then his face.
sentences.cn: 他把两只手插进那件皮大衣,然后把头也埋了进去.

sentences.en: In the mountains the crab saw a raccoon taking a nap.
sentences.cn: 在山中,他看见一只浣熊正在小睡.

sentences.en: It made no difference to the raccoon.
That is what's left . Raccoon City , after the military fired a missile.
sentences.cn: 在那个发生之后. 浣熊镇,被一枚核弹摧毁了.

sentences.en: The cause has been related to a raccoon bite.
The hound dogs treed the raccoon in 20 minutes.
sentences.cn: 猎犬在20分钟后把浣熊迫上了树(意译为:将演熊逗人了绝境).

sentences.en: The Raccoon is a wide, fresh - water river in west - central Iowa.
sentences.cn: 阮昆河是爱荷华州的西面中部一条宽阔的淡水河.

sentences.en: Then the crab began to cut the raccoon's hair.
sentences.cn: 于是螃蟹开始为浣熊理发.

sentences.en: Then the Raccoon part is constructed, again ignoring the ZooAnimal.
sentences.cn: 然后,构造Raccoon部分, 再次忽略ZooAnimal初始化 式.

sentences.en: There are 7 species of raccoon in the world distributed in both Americas.
sentences.cn: 浣熊栖息在美洲,世界上已知有七种,鼻子像猫,脸上像戴了一付眼罩,身上的毛很厚,黑白相间的一簇尾巴尤其美丽.

sentences.en: This tape, work of former Raccoon 7 anchorwoman Terri Morales.
sentences.cn: 这盘带子, 是前浣熊市7频道主播泰瑞莫拉斯拍摄的.

sentences.en: We have unconfirmed reports of disaster at Raccoon City.
sentences.cn: 关于浣熊市事故的报告.

trans.tran_en: a small North American animal with black fur around its eyes and black and grey rings on its tail
